item.title: Kubernetes
item.author: ht1911@gmail.com (Park SangKil)
item.description: Amazon EKS Workshop https://www.eksworkshop.com/ Amazon ECS Workshop for AWS Fargate https://ecsworkshop.com/ 운영 수준의 컨테이너 오케스트레이션 https://kubernetes.io/ko/ The ultimate guide for local development on Kubernetes: Draft vs Skaffold vs Garden.io https://codefresh.io/howtos/local-k8s-draft-skaffold-garden/ Create A CI/CD Pipeline With Kubernetes And Jenkins https://www.magalix.com/blog/create-a-ci/cd-pipeline-with-kubernetes-and-jenkins Minikube Installation On Mac https://containerlabs.kubedaily.com/Kubernetes/fundamentals/minikube_on_mac.html A K8s-native Pipeline resource. https://github.com/tektoncd/pipeline
item.dc:creator: Park SangKil
